articles.title: Sweden's stubborn hold on Huawei ban to hurt itself: expert - Global Times
articles.description: A Swedish court has reportedly dismissed an appeal by Huawei against the country's 5G ban on the Chinese telecom giant, dimming the company's hope in participating in the small-sized market's 5G rollout in the future.
